name: Ruuuuuuuun
description:
This is a 2D game, runner for 2 player. You must run to avoid leaving the screen while also punching your friend to maximize your chance of winning.

You need 2 Xbox Controller and a friend to play it well.

Credits:

  • Etienne Dumaire (me)
  • Jacques

  • We used the character of :

  • Etienne Dumaire
